extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Connect the Dots - Summer Edition!A brand new free pack, for you to enjoy during the Summer!Connect the Dots - Summer Edition has 2 different game modes:1 - Arcade game with 2 dots: connect the two dots of the same color without overlapping other connections2 - Time Bomb, play the 2 dots arcade mode, but with time bombs that will explode if you are not wuick enough to connect the dot with the bomb!!** NOTE: to remove a path, just keep pressing on one of the dots that composes the path! **Connect the dots - Summer Edition is ***FREE***Don't pay for hints, just play and earn them!Features:- Hundreds of boards- From 5x5 to 10x10 squares- Recommended for Pads and phones with big screen (boards 9x9 and above)Enjoy Connect the Dots - Summer Edition!!

reviews.title: good app
reviews.comment: It is a very interesting APP for Phones. This is one of the best android application and i enjoyed using it on my android phone. Thanks a lot.
reviews.author: Aleksandar Mitrovski

reviews.title: Really cool!
reviews.comment: I really found this game cool! I wanted to play this kind of game for some time and I finally found it! Such a great time killer!   Nice one! Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Dejan Stanojevic
